oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of a scene from a play performed by the Nashville Conservatory of Music, the Goodlettsville Methodist church and leaders at the church's 100th anniversary, church leaders, a high school football game, Vanderbilt University law students, the Statue of Liberty, and masonic leaders. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
